verbs.description: so [V: do] the democrats need to embrace conservatism the title is a reflection on david frum recent article in the atlantic entitled the republicans need to embrace liberalism so do not be totally put off by the concept in his piece he quotes yale sociologist jonathan reider from 1985 book lovers kos liberation league brett kavanaugh senate republicans republican party united states senator kos kos media gop texas dmca
